attributes.action: STOP MP'S RECEIVING A PAY RISE WHEN THE COUNTRY IS IN TROUBLE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe it is deplorable, that lower paid people are being asked to tighten their belts and not ask for pay rises, and then MP's think they are entitled to one. I request the Prime Minster stops or advises MP's to show compassion for their voters and refuse a pay rise this year.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
